snippet: Phil Anselmo, once the singer of Pantera, played with his new group, Philip H. Anselmo & the Illegals, at Gramercy Theater.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by Philip H Anselmo & the Illegals at the Gramercy Ballroom.
lead_paragraph: Phil Anselmo, once the singer of Pantera, played with his new group, Philip H. Anselmo & the Illegals, at Gramercy Theater.
